Package org.fcrepo.server.messaging

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    APIMMessage  
    FedoraMessage
    Implementations should override toString() to provide a serialization of the message.
    Messaging
    The Messaging subsystem interface.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AllUnitTests  
    AtomAPIMMessage
    Representation of an API-M method call as an Atom entry.
    AtomAPIMMessageTest  
    FedoraMethod
    Representation of a Fedora API Method.
    FedoraTypes
    Utility class for retrieving the XML Schema Datatypes associated with Fedora API methods.
    JMSManager
    The JMSManager class is a facade in that it provides a very simple interface for using JMS.
    MessagingImpl
    The default, JMS implementation of Messaging.
    MessagingModule
    Fedora's Messaging as a configurable module.
    NotificationInvocationHandler
    A InvocationHandler responsible for sending notifications via Messaging.
    NotificationInvocationHandlerTest
    Test sending of messages by NotificationInvocationHandler.
